additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Extract (Bamboo), Pumice, Decyl Glucoside, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Equisetum Arvense Extract (Horsetail), Arctium Lappa Root Extract (Burdock), Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Xanthan Gum, Cetearyl Glucoside, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Lactic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol.

description: Sukin Natural Balance Scalp Scrub Tube
